channel.title: LSUS Community Events
channel.description: Weekly updates on LSUS campus events and sports

item.title: Week 1 Events: November 1-4
item.description: Catch the Student Organization Council Meeting on Nov 1 at 11 a.m. in the Student Organization Lounge, followed by Hamlet: Piloting a Shakespeare Experience on Nov 4 at 11 a.m. and 6 p.m. in the University Center Theater. Daylight Saving Time ends on Nov 3, so don’t forget to set your clocks back!

item.title: Week 2 Events: November 5-11
item.description: It’s Election Day on Nov 5! The Health & Wellness Fair is on Nov 6 from 10 a.m. to noon in the UC Ballroom. Veterans Day is on Nov 11, and World Kindness Week kicks off the same day with a virtual scavenger hunt at noon. In sports, catch Men's Basketball on Nov 5 at 6 p.m. and Women’s Soccer vs Texas A&M-San Antonio on Nov 7 at 1 p.m.

item.title: Week 3 Events: November 12-18
item.description: World Kindness Week continues through Nov 17. On Nov 21, both Women’s and Men’s Basketball teams play Texas College in a doubleheader, starting at 5:30 p.m. and 7:30 p.m. Catch the games and cheer on the Pilots!

item.title: Week 4 Events: November 25-30
item.description: Celebrate Thankful Monday on Nov 25 from 11 a.m. to noon, then enjoy Thanksgiving on Nov 28. Don’t miss Women’s and Men’s Basketball on Nov 26 against Louisiana Christian at 5:30 p.m. and 7:30 p.m.
